sql-case.value: CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))
CREATE TABLE t_order_item ( item_id NUMBER(10), order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10) )
CREATE TABLE "t_order" ("order_id" NUMBER(10), "user_id" NUMBER(10), "status" VARCHAR2(10), "column1" VARCHAR2(10), "column2" VARCHAR2(10), "column3" VARCHAR2(10))
CREATE GLOBAL TEMPORARY TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))
CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10) NOT NULL, user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))
CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10) DEFAULT ON NULL 0, user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))

CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10) GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY START WITH 1 MAXVALUE 100, user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))

CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10) ENCRYPT USING 'encrypt_algorithm' IDENTIFIED BY '123456', user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))
CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10) CONSTRAINT pk_order_id PRIMARY KEY, user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))
CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10) CONSTRAINT uk_order_id UNIQUE, user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))

CREATE TABLE t_order_item (item_id NUMBER(10), order_id NUMBER(10) CONSTRAINT fk_order_id REFERENCES t_order (order_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))
CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10) CONSTRAINT chk_order_id CHECK (order_id > 0), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))

CREATE TABLE t_order_item (item_id NUMBER(10) PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE NOT NULL CHECK (order_id > 0), order_id NUMBER(10) CONSTRAINT fk_order_id REFERENCES t_order (order_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10) NULL, column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))
CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10), CONSTRAINT pk_order_id PRIMARY KEY (order_id))

CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10), CONSTRAINT pk_order_id_user_id_status PRIMARY KEY (order_id, user_id, status))
CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10), CONSTRAINT uk_order_id UNIQUE (order_id))

CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10), CONSTRAINT uk_order_id UNIQUE (order_id, user_id, status))

CREATE TABLE t_order_item (item_id NUMBER(10), order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10), CONSTRAINT fk_order_id FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES t_order (order_id) ON DELETE CASCADE)

CREATE TABLE t_order_item (item_id NUMBER(10), order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10), CONSTRAINT fk_order_id FOREIGN KEY (order_id, user_id, status) REFERENCES t_order (order_id, user_id, status) ON DELETE CASCADE)
CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10), CONSTRAINT chk_order_id CHECK (order_id > 0))

CREATE TABLE t_order_item (item_id NUMBER(10), order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10), PRIMARY KEY (item_id), UNIQUE (item_id), FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES t_order (order_id) ON DELETE CASCADE), CHECK (item_id > 0))
CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10) PRIMARY KEY USING INDEX idx_order_id, user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))

CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10) PRIMARY KEY USING INDEX (CREATE INDEX idx_order_id ON t_order (order_id)), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10))
CREATE TABLE t_order (order_id NUMBER(10), user_id NUMBER(10), status VARCHAR2(10), column1 VARCHAR2(10), column2 VARCHAR2(10), column3 VARCHAR2(10)) PARTITION BY HASH (order_id) PARTITIONS 2
CREATE INDEX idx_order_id ON t_order (order_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_order_id ON t_order (order_id)
CREATE INDEX "idx_order_id" ON "t_order" ("order_id")
CREATE INDEX idx_order_id_user_id_status ON t_order (order_id, user_id, status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uk_order_id ON t_order (order_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_upper_status ON t_order (UPPER(status))
